Articles.Content:
When I click on one of the links to download the game, I get sent to this page

" http://ksp.cdn.multiplay.co.uk/secure/?token=f7700909-cdea-4c21-9a9f-11b5bdc61b59 "

With this error on the screen

" Invalid Token "

Thanks

This can sometimes happen if the servers are busy, but it's possible there's some kind of issue with your cookies or browser cache. Try clearing both cookies and your cache, and log out and back into the KSP Store before trying again.
Did all the above, its been a few hours. Even tried on IE and got a 403. Still no go.

I can't remember, but CTRL+SHIFT+R might also force a reload with IE. Sometimes F5 just won't do it.

~Claw
Still getting invalid token. If it helps I just got satellite internet.

It doesn't help us, but I am also getting this same error.

Edited October 20, 2014 by Hormisdas
Corrected typo
Still getting the invalid token error and it appears I am not the only one. Any fix for this?
Still getting the error. On two different computers in my house. I would hazard to guess the hosting system doesn't like my internet connection for some reason. Can we please get a fix for this?

I seem to remember this happening to someone else before. Try e-mailing [email protected] with details of the problem, what you've tried so far, and proof of purchase. That proof should be an e-mail you received just after buying it.

I've gotten it to download. The problem was my satellite internet. (DishNet, if you wanted an answer to the question "Which internet service provider should I never use?") I went to my grandmother's house and used her internet and it worked fine. Try and use someone else's internet.

I seem to remember this happening to someone else before. Try e-mailing [email protected] with details of the problem, what you've tried so far, and proof of purchase. That proof should be an e-mail you received just after buying it.

Thanks for the info, it doesn't appear they respond respond from that address though.

I've gotten it to download. The problem was my satellite internet. (DishNet, if you wanted an answer to the question "Which internet service provider should I never use?") I went to my grandmother's house and used her internet and it worked fine. Try and use someone else's internet.

I am on hughesnet satellite internet. I just moved here and don't know anyone else yet. All my neighbors use sat internet as well. They need to change the settings somewhere to allow sat internet users to download this.

Hi,

No, sorry, there is no mirror download, and since the problem is your ISP there is nothing we can do to help you from our end other than advise you to download the game from a different internet connection.

Best regards,

KSP Support

Hey, thanks for that KSP support. You don't even host the game your self, did you even send a message to the host asking about satellite customers having issues?
